overview.business_description: French multinational automobile manufacturer. Third-largest European automaker. Brands include Renault, Dacia, Alpine. Strong presence in EV market with Zoe and Megane E-Tech.
business_positives: Recently upgraded to investment grade (BBB-) by S&P
Strong cost discipline under Renaulution strategy
Dacia brand performing well in value segment
overview.fatal_flaw: European auto market structural challenges; EV pricing pressure; Nissan stake uncertainty
overview.recent_news: S&P upgraded to investment grade BBB- (Mar 2025). Successfully issued first green bonds for EUR850m.

credit_opinion.summary: Renault has achieved a significant milestone with investment grade status from S&P. The Renaulution strategy has delivered improved margins and cost efficiency. Rating trajectory remains positive.
key_risks: EV transition costs and competitive pressure
credit_opinion.recommendation: OVERWEIGHT - Investment grade achieved, momentum positive
